mapper.select: SELECT counselor_id counselorId, name, avatar, phone_number phoneNumber, password, email, counselor_certificate counselorCertificate, is_supervisor isSupervisor, status, expertise_area expertiseArea, on_duty onDuty FROM Counselor WHERE counselor_id = #{counselorId}
mapper.update: UPDATE Counselor SET name = #{name}, avatar = #{avatar}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, password = #{password}, email = #{email}, counselor_certificate = #{counselorCertificate}, is_supervisor = #{isSupervisor}, status = #{status}, expertise_area = #{expertiseArea}, on_duty = #{onDuty} WHERE counselor_id = #{counselorId}

UPDATE Supervisor SET name = #{name}, avatar = #{avatar}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, password = #{password}, email = #{email}, counselor_certificate = #{counselorCertificate}, is_supervisor = #{isSupervisor}, status = #{status}, expertise_area = #{expertiseArea}, on_duty = #{onDuty} WHERE phone_number = #{phoneNumber}
